Name: **Cell_ID**
Description: This fields reports the unique identifier for Region of Interest (ROI) that represent the boundaries of a Cell identified as part of this experiment. Note: this is used to connect individual Spots or Traces that are part of the same Cell.

Name: *Extra_Cell_ROI_ID*
Description: In case multiple Cells are localized within a given extracellular structure (e.g., Tissue) Region of Interest (ROI), this fields reports the unique identifier that allows to identify such as ROI. Note: this is used to connect individual Cells that are part of the same extracellular ROI.
Conditional requirement conditions: Conditional requirement: this column is mandatory if data in this table can be associated with an extracellular ROI identified as part of this experiment.
